json_data.name: Admin
json_data.description: Admin app for admins with app and server configuration, monitoring of live connections and logs, statistics with charts, broadcast and maintenance functions, database management, OS info, process info and user management
json_data.pattern: Forms management master detail using pure div and event delegation, Reports queue management, performance test analysis
json_data.technology: chart pie, chart bar, server side events without using EventSource

json_data.name: App Portfolio
json_data.reference: OS app presentation Ubuntu and Windows

json_data.name: Presentation
json_data.description: Presentation app that shows documentation of project
json_data.pattern: Object Relational Mapping (ORM), openAPI, ISO20022, JSDoc, stateless documentation
json_data.technology: Markdown render, Markdown to HTML conversion using Vue SFC pattern on server, Typescript, ER Model, arquitecture diagram including ORM, Infrastructure as code diagram
json_data.reference: jsdoc.app, www.readthedocs.com, www.openapis.org, Oracle SQL Data modeler, Terraform, www.iso20022.org

json_data.name: Timetables
json_data.description: Timetable app using advanced CSS, complete regional and language settings, pixel perfect reports and map with gps functionality that integrates with microservices
json_data.technology: Regional settings and languages in the whole world, Gregorian and Hijri calendar calculations, advanced CSS theme management
screenshot_end: [![Showing arabic Nastaliq font and chinese timetable and spanish ui using default font and mixing RTL and LTR](/common/documents/screenshot_app4_arabic_chinese_hanidec_nastaliq_timetable_rtl_user_menu_ltr_spanish_ui_small.webp)](/common/documents/screenshot_app4_arabic_chinese_hanidec_nastaliq_timetable_rtl_user_menu_ltr_spanish_ui.webp)

json_data.name: Bank
json_data.description: Bank app with core bank functionality using ISO standards and security in focus, integrates payment requests with merchants bank account and uses server functions
json_data.pattern: ISO20022, factory pattern using entity/resource and json in data model concept, serverless functions, IAM
json_data.technology: serverless functions, server side events without using EventSource
json_data.reference: Virtual Private Address: Pix Brazil www.bcb.gov.br/en/financialstability/pix_en, Payment request process: Swish developer.swish.nu, Payment REST API: Stripe docs.stripe.com/payments
json_data.security: OWASP improved security solution compared to references with higher level of encrypted messages, server controlled events using IAM authenticated server side events without thirdparty webhooks, without exposed messages and stateless design without any certificates saved in clients

json_data.name: Shop
json_data.description: Shop app that shows a product with variants and stock info to buy, uses direct bank payment and external app server function pattern to communicate with bank app
json_data.pattern: ISO20022, factory pattern using entity/resource and json in data model concept, serverless functions, IAM
json_data.technology: serverless functions, server side events without using EventSource
json_data.reference: Payment request process: Swish developer.swish.nu, Payment REST API: Stripe docs.stripe.com/payments
json_data.security: OWASP improved security solution compared to references with higher level of encrypted messages, server controlled events using IAM authenticated server side events without thirdparty webhooks, without exposed messages and stateless design without any certificates saved in clients

json_data.name: Maps
json_data.description: World map that integrates with microservices

json_data.name: Cube
json_data.description: Cube solver app using generative AI pattern that uses robot or human model to solve current cube state
json_data.technology: svg animation, worker_threads in NodeJs to execute long time running Javascript functions without blocking main server process and sending client updates with server side events without using EventSource, javascript performance
json_data.reference: Kociemba algorithm, CFOP / Fridrich method, Thistlewaite, Singmaster notation
json_data.security: OWASP refactored thirdparty obscure animation by replacing canvas with svg animation without events and removing unnecessary obscure code

json_data.name: OTP
json_data.description: Authenticator app using Time-based One-Time Password (TOTP) SHA256 and One Time Password (OTP) key and is used for authenticating user activites when required
json_data.technology: TOTP using SHA256 key, UTC time and 30 seconds interval, OTP key using Base32

json_data.name: Common
json_data.description: Common app library including frontend for backend FFB), single file components (SFC) and management, css, documents, modules, user management, event delegation management, framework management, server side response management and utilities. Common server library with server components app, info, mail, maintenance, markdown, openapi, report and server error and server functions country, locale, document and worldcities
json_data.pattern: Frontend for backend, event delegation, SFC, SSE, simultaneous React and Vue without build step
json_data.technology: HTML to React conversion, React and Vue custom restricted event and app mount management, React and Vue components without transpilers, JWT token secured server side events without using EventSource
